synopsis.text: Kumamoto Prefecture's picturesque town of Takamori, nestled at the base of the majestic Aso Mountains, is about to witness an extraordinary encounter in this special episode of Dropkick on My Devil!, made possible by a triumphant crowdfunding campaign backed by devoted fans. In a shocking turn of events, Jinbouchou, the original setting of the series, has been left in shambles by extraterrestrial debris plummeting from the cosmos. Guided by celestial bodies, the fearless Jashin-chan embarks on a journey southward, intent on confronting Yurine Hanazono, the iron-fisted ruler of this chaos-ridden town. As Jashin-chan arrives in the idyllic Takamori, she prepares to face her destiny and challenge Yurine's reign in this thrilling, standalone adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
